message:
SYSTEM: ClaseGLD-v3%28boris-asun%29.pdf: Página 51
Upgrading Database content to the semantic Web 
• Integrating information from different DB 
sources  
• Reuse of legacy DBs and legacy ontologies 
• R2O: Declarative Mapping description 
language 
• ODEMapster: Generic query processor. 
• asking queries to a relational database using 
ontology terms  
• On demand query answering  
• Batch ontology population 
• A well defined method for upgrading and 
integrating content from heterogeneous 
sources.
speaker: SYSTEM
